Name: Dragon Ninjatos
Version: 1.1
Date: 12/3/2011
Category: Weapons and Armor
Author(s): AlexScorpion
Source: 

Description
===========
Two completly new swords for you to play with.

Location
========
You can buy these ninjatos from Eorlund in White Run.

Details
=======
This is a port of my two very old swords that i initially made for Oblivion. 

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.
Oblivion\\Data\\Meshes\\Weapons\\ScorpArmory\\
Oblivion\\Data\\Textures\\Weapons\\ScorpArmory\\







History
=======
12/12/2011
- made the blades upgradeable

Contact
=======

You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as AlexScorpion
You can find me on TESNexus as AlexScorpion


Credits

Thanks to Jaysus for his tutorial, PHATE 3 and Ghogiel for some tips.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

==========

3D Studio Max - http://www.autodesk.com/3dsmax
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/

Licensing/Legal
===============


You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
